titleStmt.title: A letter from a matron of rank quality in Windsor to one of the same in Druery-lane
titleStmt.author: Kéroualle, Louise-Renée de, Duchess of Portsmouth and Aubigny, 1649-1734.
M. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Louise Renée de Penancóet de Keroualle Portsmouth. cf. NUC pre-1956.
